body_html: Are we going to eventually distinguish between mutable lists and immutable lists in the type system? I would quite like that, and it will help us do better when doing shape inference (since immutable lists don't have to deal with the covariance/contravariance problem)
body_text: Are we going to eventually distinguish between mutable lists and immutable lists in the type system? I would quite like that, and it will help us do better when doing shape inference (since immutable lists don't have to deal with the covariance/contravariance problem)
body: Are we going to eventually distinguish between mutable lists and immutable lists in the type system? I would quite like that, and it will help us do better when doing shape inference (since immutable lists don't have to deal with the covariance/contravariance problem)
